item.title: Julia add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Julia add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Julia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Julia add a quote by Lewis Carroll
Julia add a quote by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
item.description: "Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius." -- Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

item.title: Julia add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Julia add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description: "I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Julia add a quote by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra
item.description: "Facts are the enemy of truth." -- Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

item.title: Julia add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Julia add a quote by Malcolm Forbes
item.description: "The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good." -- Malcolm Forbes

item.title: Julia add a quote by Dwight D. Eisenhower
item.description: "A people that values its privileges above its principles soon loses both." -- Dwight D. Eisenhower

item.title: Julia add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance." -- Oscar Wilde
